greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: row n consists of n and the positive integers m where m-n divides m*n.
comment: The maximum term of the n-th row is n*(n+1). The minimum term of the n-th row seems to be A063428(n) if n>=2. The length of row n is A146564(n) + 1.
maple: for n from 1 to 10 do for m from 1 to n*(n+1) do if(n=m or m*n mod (m-n) = 0)then printf("%d, ",m): fi: od: od:
results.author: _Nathaniel Johnston_, Jun 22 2011
